channel.title: Cookies IRC Client 0.2
channel.description:
[b]Cookies IRC Client v0.2[/b]
Basically, if you didn't already know [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,423761.0.html]I wrote an irc client ages ago[/url]. After realising how shit it was, I decided to completely re-write it. Progress went well but like everything I program I got bored and stopped so it's still generally shit, but it's an improvement from last time :) Since it's just sitting there doing nothing I thought I might as well share it with the world!
Features and shit:
[ul][li]Parses most of the IRC protocol (i've probably just missed out a couple of error codes)[/li] [li]Multiple network list (unlike my previous attempt) with the config saved to xml[/li] [li]Most basic commands which are called by typing "/" at the start of the line. eg join,part,me,msg,notice,op,ban,topic,mode,away,nick[/li] [li]Join channel/Change nick boxes for convience[/li] [li]Channel List grabber[/li] [li]Font chooser[/li] [li]Raw Log[/li] [li]Userlist popup menu (whois/private message/ban etc)[/li] [li]System tray which notifies when one has been highlighted and when a topic has been changed[/li][/ul]
Screenies:
General chat view: [img]http://imgur.com/aEK55.png[/img]
User list popup menu: [img]http://imgur.com/nE0hD.png[/img]
Editing a network: [img]http://imgur.com/eHl2d.png[/img]
Channel List: [img]http://imgur.com/vmDAK.png[/img]
Download:
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=462186.0;attach=18722]Entire netbeans project (source,classes,jar)[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=462186.0;attach=18721]Jar[/url]
I didn't write JCloseTabbedPane, SortedModelList and JFontChooser. I only modified these classes!

item.title: Cookies IRC Client 0.2
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I am aware of that now, it’s just at the time (like 9 months ago) I adopted the ArrayList to store my channel panels and server panels and it’s just too much effort to change.

When I come to think about it, originally I planned to feature a choice between tabs and a tree to store the servers and channels but I got bored before I even attempted to implement both.

Read full topic

item.title: Cookies IRC Client 0.2
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:6, topic:365992”]oh wow, anyway that was a long long time ago. I’ve learnt so much since then, trust me!
I used an ArrayList on this but I could easily have implemented a HashMap.

ps, using a normal array for this would be silly, it only gave me a hint to use an ArrayList.[/quote]
why wouldn’t you just let the jtabbedpane just keep the array of components then you could just pull with getComponent()

for example lets say you have two panels in the tabbedpane and they both extend JPanel:
ServerPanel
RoomPanel

you could pull the server panel by doing

ServerPanel server = (ServerPanel) jTabbedPane.getComponentAt(0);

Read full topic

item.title: Cookies IRC Client 0.2
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

oh wow, anyway that was a long long time ago. I’ve learnt so much since then, trust me!
I used an ArrayList on this but I could easily have implemented a HashMap.

ps, using a normal array for this would be silly, it only gave me a hint to use an ArrayList.

Read full topic
